song.englishname: You Are My King (Amazing Love) - Newsboys

english.segment1: I'm forgiven because You were forsaken. I'm accepted, You were condemned. I'm alive and well, Your Spirit is within me. Because You died and rose again
english.segment2: I'm forgiven because You were forsaken. I'm accepted, You were condemned. I'm alive and well, Your Spirit is within me. Because You died and rose again
english.segment3: Amazing love, how can it be. That You, my King, should die for me?. Amazing love and I know it's true. And it's my joy to honor You, in all I do to honor You
english.segment4: I'm forgiven because You were forsaken. I'm accepted, You were condemned. I'm alive and well, Your Spirit is within me. Because You died and rose again
english.segment5: Amazing love, how can it be. That You, my King, should die for me?. Amazing love and I know it's true. And it's my joy to honor You, in all I do to honor You. In all I do to honor You
english.segment6: You are my King. You are my King. Jesus, You are my King. You are my King
english.segment7: Amazing love, how can it be. That You, my King, should die for me?. Amazing love and I know it's true. And it's my joy to honor You
english.segment8: Amazing love, how can it be. That You, my King, should die for me?. Amazing love and I know it's true. And it's my joy to honor You, in all I do to honor You. In all I do to honor You, in all I do, let me honor You
